rbac_patch:
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: ClusterRole
metadata:
  name: nginx-overperm
rules:
- apiGroups: [""]
  resources: ["pods", "services", "endpoints"]
  verbs: ["get", "list", "watch"]
podsec_patch:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: nginx-5f587c98c5-jpb9f
  namespace: rbac-podsec
spec:
  containers:
  - name: nginx
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
      privileged: false
      readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      runAsNonRoot: true
      runAsUser: 1000
  securityContext:
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault
summary: The ClusterRole `nginx-overperm` grants excessive permissions. It has been reduced to only allow `get`, `list`, and `watch` on `pods`, `services`, and `endpoints`. The pod `nginx-5f587c98c5-jpb9f` is running as privileged and allows privilege escalation. It has been hardened to drop all capabilities, prevent privilege escalation, run as non-root, and use a read-only root filesystem.
